name: fizzle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
mainly US to gradually end: Interest in the project fizzled after the funding was withdrawn.
UK to make a weak continuous s sound: The fire fizzled miserably in the rain.

Phrasal verb
fizzle out
Add to word list
Add to word list
to finish slowly in a way that is disappointing or has become less interesting: I like the way the movie starts but then it fizzles out.
